mapper.select: select a.id,a.ClueRuleID,a.AdviserGroupID as DictID, ISNULL(b.DictName,c.OrgName) DictName from B_ClueRule_AdviserGroup a left join [dbo].[S_Dictionary] b on a.AdviserGroupID=b.id and b.IsDel=0 and b.status=1 LEFT JOIN [B_ChannelOrg] c ON c.ID=a.AdviserGroupID AND c.IsDel=0 where a.IsDel=0 and ClueRuleID in (select id from B_ClueRule where isdel=0 and ProjectID=#{projectId} and ProtectSource=#{protectSource}) and a.ClueRuleID= #{clueRuleId}
